text: Ibrahim teuma nyang laen ulah Geulakee ampon keu ayah gopnyan Lam ate gopnyan sabab ka leupah Ka geumeujanji yoh masa dilee ‘Oh ban ka teuntee ka laen ulah ‘Oh ban ka nyata nyan musoh Tuhan Geucabot yohnyan lakee bak Allah Ka leupah gopnyan han le geulakee Ibrahim teuntee ate got leupah Ate peunyanton sayang barangsoe
